test-set.name: fn-load-xquery-module
test-set.description: Tests for the fn:load-xquery-module() function introduced in XPath 3.1

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-001
test-case.description: Checks for an error when calling fn:load-xquery-module without a module-uri.

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-002
test-case.description: Checks for an error when calling fn:load-xquery-module without a module-uri.

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-003
test-case.description: Checks for an error when calling fn:load-xquery-module and the module-uri cannot be resolved.

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-004
test-case.description: Checks for an error when calling fn:load-xquery-module and the module-uri cannot be resolved.

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-005
test-case.description: Checks for an error when calling fn:load-xquery-module against an invalid module.

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-006
test-case.description: Checks for an error when calling fn:load-xquery-module against an invalid module.

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-007
test-case.description: Checks for an error when calling fn:load-xquery-module and not providing a value for an external var in the module.

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-008
test-case.description: Checks for an error when calling fn:load-xquery-module and not providing a value for an external var in the module.

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-009
test-case.description: Checks for an error when calling fn:load-xquery-module and not providing a context item for the module.

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-010
test-case.description: Checks for an error when calling fn:load-xquery-module and not providing a context item for the module.

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-011
test-case.description: Checks for an error when calling fn:load-xquery-module and providing the wrong type of value for an external var in the module.

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-012
test-case.description: Checks that a dynamic error caused when fn:load-xquery-module processes a module is returned as is.

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-013
test-case.description: Checks that a dynamic error caused when fn:load-xquery-module processes a module is returned as is.

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-014

modified.change: Added module element, fix test typos

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-015
test-case.description: Loads a module and sets the value for an external var in the module.

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-016
test-case.description: Loads a module and sets the context item for the module.

modified.change: Added module element and spec dependency, fix test typo

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-017
test-case.description: Loads a module and sets the context item used by a variable.

test-case.name: fn-load-xquery-module-018
test-case.description: Loads a module containing functions, but no variables.
